snippet.title: Exo Exit - Return To Mars - First Gameplay Taster
snippet.description:
Exo Exit Pre-Alpha Gameplay Footage Revealed - this is just a taster!

https://exoexit.com

A Shattered World - Return to Mars

The pressure’s on you to return to the hostile surface of the red planet and forge a base for mankind. It’s do or die.

Action, exploration and adventure in this VR-based first-person sci-fi simulation game.

Exo Exit coming to Kickstarter soon…

https://exoexit.com/game-news/exo-exit/t-%C2%ADminus-kickstarter-launch/

Want to be first to play the demo before anyone else then signup to our newsletter here:

https://exoexit.com/ham-conscripted-for-service/
